title: Environmental Science Practical Competency Enhancement Program Through Collaborative Action Research and AI Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic environmental science concepts and possession of practical experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative Problem-Solving Environment Utilizing Smartphone-Based AI Tools (ChatGPT)

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three-stage environmental problem-solving strategies according to the IDEE framework
Learners can design two or more lesson plans incorporating peer evaluation and feedback using the CAR Cycle
Learners can write a community environmental issue analysis report using smartphone-based AI tools
Learners can apply collaboratively developed educational materials to actual training programs through collaborative action research

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
